name: .DB3 File Extension
summary: Learn about .DB3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Database file created by SQLite, a lightweight, self-contained database program that creates databases using plain files; contains the database structure as well as data records; used for storing and retrieving structured data using SQL.

content: A common SQLite DB3 file is PalmDatabase.db3, which stores personal information on the Palm Pre, including contacts, account information, and call logs.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
